rules.text: Don’t harass, troll, seek to offend, spam, or otherwise be a jerk.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or other horrible -isms or -ias.
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.
No spreading of lies or misinformation.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.

Your response must be only the score number and anything else.
